/usr/bin/g++-10 CMakeFiles/bvh_viz.dir/src/main.cu.o CMakeFiles/bvh_viz.dir/include/bvh.cu.o CMakeFiles/bvh_viz.dir/include/query.cu.o -o bvh_viz  -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl  -L"/usr/local/cuda-12.4/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs" -L"/usr/local/cuda-12.4/targets/x86_64-linux/lib"
